sent.orig: And so ended a remarkably successful visit-successful beyond my wildest dreams.
sent.trans: 一次非常成功的访问这么结束了——其成功大出我之所望。

sent.orig: Therefore its successful selection and application are the prerequisite for successful longwall mining.
sent.trans: 是以正确的选择和应用液压支架是长壁工作面采煤乐成的先决前提。

sent.orig: The successful application of the size and of resin depends on the successful elimination of air.
sent.trans: 施加浸润剂和施加树脂的成功取决于充分排除空气。

sent.orig: RI is successful only when Rotary clubs are successful.
sent.trans: 只有在扶轮社成功时，国际扶轮才可能成功。

sent.orig: Now why were we successful, as our predecessors were not successful?
sent.trans: 为什么我们现在成功了，而我们的前任却做不到呢？
